fullText:
Three small ways to help your senior pup thrive:

1. Orthopedic bed & easy ramps for comfy joints.
2. Short, low-impact play/walks + weight check to protect hips.
3. Regular vet checkups (dental, vision, pain screening) — early fixes help a lot.

Small changes = big comfort. 🐾 https://t.co/iFT3G7aPQp
